trans-unit.source: Defines the end of a relationship.
trans-unit.target: Define o final de uma relação.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd> defines the requirements for an object that represents an end in an association.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd> Define os requisitos para um objeto que representa uma extremidade em uma associação.

trans-unit.source: This interface is implemented by the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class.
trans-unit.target: Essa interface é implementada pelo <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> classe.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> is the base class for the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> é a classe base para o <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> e <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> classes.

trans-unit.source: The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832), which was generated by the [Entity Data Model Wizard](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5).
trans-unit.target: O exemplo neste tópico se baseia o [modelo de vendas do AdventureWorks](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832), que foi gerado pelo [Assistente de modelo de dados de entidade](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5).

trans-unit.source: The following example adds new `SalesOrderHeader` entities to the `Contact` entity.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir adiciona novas `SalesOrderHeader` entidades para o `Contact` entidade.

trans-unit.source: Then it gets all related ends from the `Contact` entity and displays relationship name, source role name, and target role name for each related end.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, ele obtém termina todas relacionada do `Contact` entidade e exibe o nome do relacionamento, nome da função de origem e nome de função de destino para cada extremidade relacionada.

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the related end.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um objeto à extremidade relacionada.

trans-unit.source: An object to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto a ser adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: <c>entity</c> must implement <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships" />.
trans-unit.target: <c>entity</c> deve implementar <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the related end.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um objeto à extremidade relacionada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> method adds an object to the related end.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> método adiciona um objeto ao final relacionado.

trans-unit.source: The related end must be an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: A extremidade relacionada deve ser um <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>.

trans-unit.source: When the source object implements <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships> and is being tracked in the <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager>, the object being added is also tracked.
trans-unit.target: Quando o objeto de origem implementa <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships> e está sendo controlado no <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectStateManager>, o objeto que está sendo adicionado também é rastreado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class explicitly implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> classe implementa explicitamente a <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> class uses this implementation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> classe usa essa implementação.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Add%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Add%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the related end is an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> and the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601.Value%2A> property of the reference is not `null`, this method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se a extremidade relacionada é um <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> e <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601.Value%2A> não é de propriedade da referência de `null`, esse método lançará uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: An object to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto a ser adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the related end.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um objeto à extremidade relacionada.

trans-unit.source: Use this method overload for entity classes that do not implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.
trans-unit.target: Use essa sobrecarga de método para classes de entidade que não implementam <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> method for entity classes that do implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> método para classes de entidade que implementam <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> method adds an object to the related end.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> método adiciona um objeto ao final relacionado.

trans-unit.source: The related end must be an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: A extremidade relacionada deve ser um <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class explicitly implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> classe implementa explicitamente a <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Add%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> class uses this implementation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> classe usa essa implementação.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Add%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Add%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the related end is an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> and the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601.Value%2A> property of the reference is not `null`, this method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se a extremidade relacionada é um <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> e <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601.Value%2A> não é de propriedade da referência de `null`, esse método lançará uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: Defines a relationship between two attached objects.
trans-unit.target: Define uma relação entre dois objetos anexados.

trans-unit.source: The object being attached.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que está sendo anexado.

trans-unit.source: <c>entity</c> must implement <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships" />.
trans-unit.target: <c>entity</c> deve implementar <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships" />.

trans-unit.source: Defines a relationship between two attached objects.
trans-unit.target: Define uma relação entre dois objetos anexados.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> method is used to define a relationship between two objects that are both attached to the same <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> método é usado para definir uma relação entre dois objetos que estão anexados ao mesmo <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> instância.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class explicitly implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> classe implementa explicitamente a <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> class uses this implementation to define relationships between the attached source object and the object attached to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> classe usa essa implementação para definir relações entre o objeto de origem conectados e o objeto anexado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Attaching and Detaching Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [anexar e desanexar objetos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23).

trans-unit.source: The object being attached.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que está sendo anexado.

trans-unit.source: Defines a relationship between two attached objects.
trans-unit.target: Define uma relação entre dois objetos anexados.

trans-unit.source: Use this method overload for entity classes that do not implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.
trans-unit.target: Use essa sobrecarga de método para classes de entidade que não implementam <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> method for entity classes that do implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> método para classes de entidade que implementam <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> method is used to define a relationship between two objects that are both attached to the same <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> método é usado para definir uma relação entre dois objetos que estão anexados ao mesmo <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectContext> instância.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class explicitly implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> classe implementa explicitamente a <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Attach%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> class uses this implementation to define relationships between the attached source object and the object attached to the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> classe usa essa implementação para definir relações entre o objeto de origem conectados e o objeto anexado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Attaching and Detaching Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [anexar e desanexar objetos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/41d5c1ef-1b78-4502-aa10-7e1438d62d23).

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> that represents the objects that belong to the related end.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> que representa os objetos que pertencem à extremidade relacionada.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> that represents the objects that belong to the related end.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> que representa os objetos que pertencem à extremidade relacionada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.CreateSourceQuery%2A> method is explicitly implemented by the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.CreateSourceQuery%2A> método é implementado explicitamente pelo <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> classes both override the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.System%23Data%23Objects%23DataClasses%23IRelatedEnd%23CreateSourceQuery%2A> method to return an <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> that, when it is executed, returns the same set of objects that belong to the related end.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> e <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> classes substituem o <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.System%23Data%23Objects%23DataClasses%23IRelatedEnd%23CreateSourceQuery%2A> método para retornar um <xref:System.Data.Objects.ObjectQuery%601> que, quando ele é executado, retorna o mesmo conjunto de objetos que pertencem ao final relacionado.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> that iterates through the collection of related objects.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> que itera na coleção de objetos relacionados.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> that iterates through the collection of related objects.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> que itera na coleção de objetos relacionados.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether all related objects have been loaded.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se todos os objetos relacionados foram carregados.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the related end contains all the related entities from the database; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a extremidade relacionada contém todas as entidades relacionadas do banco de dados; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A> method of <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> classe implementa o <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A> método <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> classes inherit from <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> e <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> classes herdadas de <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd>.

trans-unit.source: [Defining and Managing Relationships](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2c92c097-56bd-4145-989e-16d92475ecda)
trans-unit.target: [Definir e gerenciar relações](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2c92c097-56bd-4145-989e-16d92475ecda)

trans-unit.source: Loads the related object or objects into this related end.
trans-unit.target: Carrega o objeto ou objetos relacionados nessa extremidade relacionada.

trans-unit.source: `Load` is called to explicitly load related objects from a related end that is exposed by a navigation property.
trans-unit.target: `Load` é chamado para carregar explicitamente os objetos relacionados de um end relacionado que é exposto por uma propriedade de navegação.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [objetos relacionados ao carregar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1).

trans-unit.source: Loads the related object or objects into this related end with the default merge option.
trans-unit.target: Carrega um ou mais objetos relacionados nessa extremidade relacionada, com a opção de mesclagem padrão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Load%2A> method of <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> classe implementa o <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Load%2A> método <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd>.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A> is called to explicitly load related objects from a related end exposed by a navigation property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A> é chamado para carregar explicitamente os objetos relacionados de uma extremidade relacionada exposta por uma propriedade de navegação.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [objetos relacionados ao carregar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A> method loads related objects from the data source whether or not <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.Load%2A> método carrega objetos relacionados da fonte de dados ou não <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A> é `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption" /> to use when merging objects into an existing <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.MergeOption" /> a ser usado ao mesclar objetos em uma <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection`1" /> existente.

trans-unit.source: Loads the related object or objects into the related end with the specified merge option.
trans-unit.target: Carrega um ou mais objetos relacionados na extremidade relacionada, com a opção de mesclagem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> classe implementa o <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Load%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> and <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> classes override this implementation.
trans-unit.target: Tanto o <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> e <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityReference%601> classes substituir essa implementação.

trans-unit.source: `Load` is called to explicitly load related objects from a related end that is exposed by a navigation property.
trans-unit.target: `Load` é chamado para carregar explicitamente os objetos relacionados de um end relacionado que é exposto por uma propriedade de navegação.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Loading Related Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [objetos relacionados ao carregar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/452347d2-7b3b-44cd-9001-231299a28cb1).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Load%2A> method loads related objects from the data source whether or not <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Load%2A> método carrega objetos relacionados da fonte de dados ou não <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.IsLoaded%2A> é `true`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the relationship in which this related end participates.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome da relação na qual essa extremidade relacionada participa.

trans-unit.source: The name of the relationship in which this <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd" /> is participating.
trans-unit.target: O nome da relação na qual este <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd" /> está participando.

trans-unit.source: The relationship name is not namespace qualified.
trans-unit.target: O nome da relação não é qualificado de namespace.

trans-unit.source: The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832), which was generated by the [Entity Data Model Wizard](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5).
trans-unit.target: O exemplo neste tópico se baseia o [modelo de vendas do AdventureWorks](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832), que foi gerado pelo [Assistente de modelo de dados de entidade](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/423ec9a7-5464-43b7-a7ef-9f5f000848b5).

trans-unit.source: The following example adds new `SalesOrderHeader` entities to the `Contact` entity.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir adiciona novas `SalesOrderHeader` entidades para o `Contact` entidade.

trans-unit.source: Then it gets all related ends from the `Contact` entity and displays the relationship name, source role name, and target role name for each related end.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, ele obtém termina todas relacionada do `Contact` entidade e exibe o nome da relação, o nome da função de origem e a função de destino name para cada relacionado final.

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference to the metadata for the related end.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma referência aos metadados da extremidade relacionada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipSet" /> object that contains metadata for the end of a relationship.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipSet" /> objeto que contém metadados para o final de uma relação.

trans-unit.source: Removes an object from the collection of objects at the related end.
trans-unit.target: Remove um objeto da coleção de objetos na extremidade relacionada.

trans-unit.source: The object to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser removido da coleção.

trans-unit.source: <c>entity</c> must implement <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships" />.
trans-unit.target: <c>entity</c> deve implementar <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes an object from the collection of objects at the related end.
trans-unit.target: Remove um objeto da coleção de objetos na extremidade relacionada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="entity" /> was successfully removed, <see langword="false" /> if <paramref name="entity" /> was not part of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="entity" /> foi removido com êxito, <see langword="false" /> se <paramref name="entity" /> não fazia parte da <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> method removes an object from the related end.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> método Remove um objeto de final relacionado.

trans-unit.source: The related end must be an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: A extremidade relacionada deve ser um <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class explicitly implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> classe implementa explicitamente a <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> class uses this implementation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> classe usa essa implementação.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Remove%2A>.

trans-unit.source: An object to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto a ser removido da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Removes an object from the collection of objects at the related end.
trans-unit.target: Remove um objeto da coleção de objetos na extremidade relacionada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="entity" /> was successfully removed; <see langword="false" /> if <paramref name="entity" /> was not part of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="entity" /> foi removido com êxito; <see langword="false" /> se <paramref name="entity" /> não fazia parte da <see cref="T:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd" />.

trans-unit.source: Use this method overload for entity classes that do not implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.
trans-unit.target: Use essa sobrecarga de método para classes de entidade que não implementam <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> method for entity classes that do implement <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> método para classes de entidade que implementam <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IEntityWithRelationships>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> method removes an object from the related end.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> método Remove um objeto de final relacionado.

trans-unit.source: The related end must be an <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: A extremidade relacionada deve ser um <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class explicitly implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> classe implementa explicitamente a <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.Remove%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> class uses this implementation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601> classe usa essa implementação.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.EntityCollection%601.Remove%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the role name at the source end of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome da função na extremidade de origem da relação.

trans-unit.source: The role name at the source end of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: O nome da função na extremidade de origem da relação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.SourceRoleName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> classe implementa o <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.SourceRoleName%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.SourceRoleName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.SourceRoleName%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The role name is specified by the `Role` attribute of the `End` element in the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: O nome da função é especificado pelo `Role` atributo o `End` elemento na associação que define essa relação no modelo conceitual.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Elemento de Associação (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).

trans-unit.source: Gets the role name at the target end of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome da função na extremidade de destino da relação.

trans-unit.source: The role name at the target end of the relationship.
trans-unit.target: O nome da função na extremidade de destino da relação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> class implements the <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.TargetRoleName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd> classe implementa o <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.IRelatedEnd.TargetRoleName%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.TargetRoleName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.RelatedEnd.TargetRoleName%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The role name is specified by the `Role` attribute of the `End` element in the association that defines this relationship in the conceptual model.
trans-unit.target: O nome da função é especificado pelo `Role` atributo o `End` elemento na associação que define essa relação no modelo conceitual.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Association Element (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Elemento de Associação (CSDL)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c305169a-8af7-432f-9ba7-800a163aed41).
